conbody.p: A configuration project is an extract of an original standard project delivered with Design Studio. It becomes the starting point for adapting the standard packaging to your needs using Design Studio's visual designers and embedded server. It is highly recommended that you create a new branch in your source control management based on the standard project model.
Typically, non-technical business end-users will find it easier adapting a configuration project because technical artifacts are hidden in a configuration project.
